snippet: Kenneth P. Thompson, who is running against Charles J. Hynes for Brooklyn district attorney, criticized him for using a staff member in a political commercial.
abstract: Trailside blog; Kenneth P Thompson, who is running against Charles J Hynes for Brooklyn district attorney, criticizes Hynes for using staff member Diana Brogan in political commercial.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth P. Thompson, who is running against Charles J. Hynes for Brooklyn district attorney, criticized him for using a staff member in a political commercial.

headline.main: In Hynes Ad, Praise for the Boss
headline.print_headline:
In Hynes’s Ad,
Praise for the Boss
